title: Flipper Zero RFID & NFC Hunting ðŸ”Ž ðŸ‘“ #shorts #flipperzero #nfc #rfid
transcript: You can install a whole bunch of applications from your phone onto the Flipper Zero. One of those applications is an NFC RFID detector so I've installed that onto the Flipper Zero from my phone I'm going to open the application and I can use the phone to control the Flipper Zero or do it directly from the Flipper Zero and I'll just press the button to detect the field. I need to now hold this near a device and as you can see there it said NFC 13.56 MHz so I'm able to detect what is being used in the safe. I could also do it over here also NFC but different types of readers can be detected so we could detect NFC or RFID or we can detect if the reader uses both RFID and NFC. Many applications can be installed on the Flipper Zero. It's basically an app store for the Flipper Zero to extend the functionality of the Flipper Zero. There are other places to get applications as well and you can write your own.
